title: First Public Tweet
body: 4156 laid out the broad strokes of what would become NounsDAO.

title: Initial Drafts
body: Gremplin & 4156 look at the first sketches on which path to take for the art.

title: Protonoun
body: The first published instance of the Nouns glasses. The ''eraser guy'' was dubbed Protonoun.

title: Git init
body: Vape Ape creates the first commit in the Github monorepo.

title: Nounish Design
body: The rough Noun aesthetics were decided upon and it was time to iterate & polish.

title: Glasses & Body Done
body: The rough Noun aesthetics were decided upon and it was time to iterate & polish.

title: Digitally Rare Pod
body: 4156 appears on the podcast, Digitally Rare to discuss the project.

title: Rinkeby Testing
body: Nouns public testnet goes live for final testing.

title: First Extension Project
body: Noun GAN Study by VanArman, based off the Rinkeby Nouns, releases on OpenSea.

title: Project Launch
body: The experiment called Nouns begins and Xaix wins Auction #1 for 613.37 ETH.

title: Noun Fractionalized
body: Noun 11 was bought by PartDAO and became the first fractionalized Noun.

title: First proposal passes
body: The DAO's first proposal, 'Donate 5 ETH each to 6 Charities', passes

title: First Auction Fork
body: The extension project, Alt Nouns, forked the distribution mechanism.

title: Small Grants Committee
body: Prop 13 passes and the 'Small Grants and Retro Funding' committee forms to help empower builders.

title: FOMO community-mints Noun
body: The 'FOMO Nouns' project (proposal 13) delivers the first community-minted Noun.

title: Nouns x Superbowl
body: Nouns glasses appeard in the BudLight commercial for Superbowl LVI.
